name: Monokai Pro Theme
description:
The unofficial Monokai Pro theme by Subtheme, adapted for JetBrains. This plugin includes the default theme and four filters: Machine, Octagon, Ristretto, and Spectrum. Credit goes to the original creator: https://monokai.pro.

An no-italics version is also available. To enable, go to Settings, select Editor/Color Scheme, and choose your preferred Scheme from the dropdown (for example, "Monokai Pro - No Italics").

Contribute with GitHub. Screenshots taken with Atom Material Icons and Operator Mono.
